text: Are All Men Pedophiles? is a 2012 documentary movie about pedophilia and hebephilia. It was directed and written by Jan-Willem Breure. Are All Men Pedophiles? was premiered (shown for the first time) at the Queens World Film Festival in New York City on March 2, 2012. title: Are All Men Pedophiles?
